data.address: 2836 San Bruno Ave, San Francisco, CA 94134, United States of America
data.about: At Chic Cuts Salon, we believe that everyone deserves to look and feel their best. That's why we offer a wide range of hair services to help you achieve your desired look. Our experienced stylists use only the highest quality products to give you the best results. Come visit us today and let us help you achieve the perfect hairstyle!

services.name: Consultation
services.description: Consultation understand the client's hair type, texture, and condition, as well as their desired hairstyle.This service can be complementary to other chosen services like haircut or included in other services such as special event or bridal event styling.

services.name: Special Event Styling
services.description: Designing and creating a hairstyle that complements the client's dress, event and overall look.May involve curling, straightening, braiding, or other styling techniques.

services.name: Bridal Hairstyling
services.description: Designing and creating a hairstyle that complements the bride's wedding dress, makeup, and overall wedding theme. May involve curling, straightening, braiding, or other styling techniques.

services.name: Shampoo & Blowout
services.description: Washing the hair with shampoo and conditioner, followed by a blow-dry and styling with a hair dryer and brush.

services.name: Hair Bleaching
services.description: Hair bleaching workmanship (lighten the natural color of hair) and products that are designed to restore moisture and prevent damage included.

services.name: Braiding short hair
services.description: Only includes braiding. Does not include washing. Braiding can be done with different types of hair, including natural hair, synthetic hair, or extensions.

services.name: Braiding long hair
services.description: Only includes braiding. Does not include washing. Braiding can be done with different types of hair, including natural hair, synthetic hair, or extensions.

services.name: Daytime hairstyling
services.description: Washing, hair treatment, styling perie/intins/bucle/impletitbrush, curl, brading, blow-drying

services.name: Bangs
services.description: styling (straight or blunt or side-swept or textured)

services.name: Hair Extensions
services.description: applying extensions. does not include actual extensions as these are bought separately and cost varies depending on product chosen

services.name: Women's haircut short hair
services.description: For hair shorter than shoulder length. Involves trimming or cutting the hair to maintain a desired length while still creating a flattering and stylish shape. Can also involve washing and conditioning the hair, and then combing it out to remove any tangles.

services.name: Women's haircut medium hair
services.description: For hair that falls just above or below the shoulders. Involves trimming or cutting the hair to maintain a desired length while still creating a flattering and stylish shape. Can also involve washing and conditioning the hair, and then combing it out to remove any tangles.

services.name: Women's haircut long hair
services.description: For hair over shoulder length. Involves trimming or cutting the hair to maintain a desired length while still creating a flattering and stylish shape. Can also involve washing and conditioning the hair, and then combing it out to remove any tangles.

services.name: Hair Dying
services.description: Price only includes workmanship. Does not include hair dying products. Price of products may vary depending on quantity used. 1 tube of hair dye costs $20. Includes hair dying, washing, hair treatment and styling

services.name: Highlights
services.description: Price only includes workmanship. Does not include hair dying products. Price of products may vary depending on quantity used. 1 tube of hair dye costs $20. Includes hair dying, washing, hair treatment and styling

services.name: Hair Toning
services.description: Adjust the color of lightened or bleached hair

services.name: Men's Haircut
services.description: includes washing, blow drying and styling

services.name: Beard Trim
services.description: Removing any excess hair growth, shaping the beard to create a defined look, and cleaning up any stray hairs or uneven patches

services.name: Beard Shaping
services.description: Can include trimming with scissors, using clippers to create a specific length, and shaving or edging the beard to create defined lines and contours.
